actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

official_title: To adjust the eastern boundary of the Whychus-Deschutes Wilderness Study Area in the State of Oregon to facilitate fire prevention and response activities to protect adjacent private property, and for other purposes.
short_title: Crooked River Ranch Fire Protection Act

summary.text:
Crooked River Ranch Fire Protection Act

This bill requires the Department of the Interior to adjust the eastern boundary of the Whychus-Deschutes Wilderness Study Area in Oregon to exclude approximately 832 acres, as depicted on the map entitled "Whychus-Deschutes Wilderness Study Area" dated December 2015, to facilitate fire prevention and response activities on the excluded public lands and adjacent private property.

titles.title: Crooked River Ranch Fire Protection Act
